text: cng raluk thung khna thi phrrya khx ngxi mrxn klaw wa xo phraphupenceakhxng kha phraxngkh! Thæcring kha phraxngkh di bn wi wa hı sing (butr) thi xyu nı khrrph khxng kha phraxngkh thuk ceaacng xyu nı thana phu khea rph xi ba dahˌ tx phraxngkh læa rab chı phraxngkh theanan dangnan khx phraxngkh di pord rab cak kha phraxngkh dwy theid thæcring phraxngkh than pen phuthrng diyin phuthrng rxbru
